Package com.github.wuic.configuration.impl

This package contains different POJO which could be used to represent the Configuration implementations.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ConfigurationImpl Implementation of the base Configuration interface.
DefaultEhCacheProvider This class is used by default to retrieve the cache for WUIC from EHCache framework.
ImageConfigurationImpl Implementation of the ImageConfiguration interface.
SpriteConfigurationImpl Default implementation of the SpriteConfiguration interface.
SpriteConfiguratonDomBuilder This builder produces SpriteConfiguration instances.
YuiConfigurationImpl Implementation as a POJO of the YuiConfiguration.
YuiCssConfigurationDomBuilder This builder produces YuiCssConfigurationDomBuilder instances.
YuiCssConfigurationImpl Implementation as a POJO of the YuiCssConfiguration.
YuiJavascriptConfigurationDomBuilder This builders produces YuiJavascriptConfigurationDomBuilder instances.
YuiJavascriptConfigurationImpl Implementation as a POJO of the YuiJavascriptConfiguration.
 

Package com.github.wuic.configuration.impl Description

This package contains different POJO which could be used to represent the Configuration implementations.

Author:
Guillaume DROUET
